title: drugAdministrations
description: Array of all drug administration protocols.

items.description: Drug administration protocol. One per administered compound and respective formulation.

administrations.description: Array of drug administrations per administration protocol. One per administered dose.

items.description: Time point of the drug administration.

duration.description: Duration of the drug administration i.e., in case of infusions.

administeredCompound.description: Compound name of the administered compound. Must match compound_name or compound_alias of compoundInfo.

formulation.description: Formulation of the administered doses, e.g., immediate release tablet

formulationComment.description: Additional information about the formulation, e.g., brand name.

administrationRoute.duration: Route of the administration, e.g., oral.
